00075     public static function install( $dbConnection = null, $name = self::DDL_TABLE_NAME )
00076     {
00077         $_db = PS::nvl( $dbConnection, PS::_db() );
00078 
00079         if ( $name && $_db )
00080         {
00081             $_path = Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'pogostick.templates.ddl' );
00082 
00083             $_sql = file_get_contents( $_path . self::DDL_NAME );
00084             if ( strlen( $_sql ) )
00085             {
00086                 $_sql = str_ireplace( '%%TABLE_NAME', $name, $_sql );
00087                 $_command = $_db->createCommand( $_sql );
00088                 if ( $_command->execute() )
00089                 {
00090                     $_sql = file_get_contents( $_path . self::DDL_DATA_NAME );
00091 
00092                     //  Load some codes...
00093                     if ( strlen( $_sql ) )
00094                     {
00095                         $_sql = str_ireplace( '%%TABLE_NAME', $name, $_sql );
00096                         $_command = $_db->createCommand( $_sql );
00097                         $_command->execute();
00098                     }
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 return true;
00102             }
00103         }
00104 
00105         return false;
00106     }

00116     protected static function getCodes( $codeId = null, $codeType = null, $codeAbbreviation = null, $sortOrder = null, $activeCodesOnly = true, $valueFilter = null )
00117     {
00118         $_criteria = null;
00119         $_modelClass = self::_findModelClass();
00120         $_model = call_user_func( array( $_modelClass, 'model' ) );
00121 
00122         if ( null === $sortOrder ) $sortOrder = $_model->primaryKey;
00123 
00124         //  Get a single code...
00125         if ( null !== $codeId ) return $_model->valueFilter( $valueFilter )->active( $activeCodesOnly )->findByPk( $codeId );
00126 
00127         $_condition = array();
00128         $_params = array();
00129 
00130         //  Get a specific code by type/abbr
00131         if ( null !== $codeType )
00132         {
00133             $_condition[] = 'code_type_text = :code_type_text';
00134             $_params[':code_type_text'] = $codeType;
00135         }
00136 
00137         if ( null !== $codeAbbreviation )
00138         {
00139             $_condition[] = 'code_abbr_text = :code_abbr_text';
00140             $_params[':code_abbr_text'] = $codeAbbreviation;
00141         }
00142 
00143         //  No conditions? Bail...
00144         if ( empty( $_condition ) )
00145             return null;
00146         
00147         $_criteria = array(
00148             'condition' => implode( ' AND ', $_condition ),
00149             'params' => $_params,
00150             'order' => PS::nvl( $sortOrder ),
00151         );
00152 
00153         return $_model->valueFilter( $valueFilter )->active( $activeCodesOnly )->findAll( $_criteria );
00154     }

00159     public function rules()
00160     {
00161         return array(
00162             array( 'code_type_text', 'length', 'max' => 60 ),
00163             array( 'code_abbr_text', 'length', 'max' => 60 ),
00164             array( 'code_desc_text', 'length', 'max' => 255 ),
00165             array( 'assoc_text', 'length', 'max' => 255 ),
00166             array( 'id, active_ind, code_type_text, code_abbr_text, code_desc_text, create_date, lmod_date', 'required' ),
00167             array( 'id, active_ind, parnt_code_id', 'numerical', 'integerOnly' => true ),
00168             array( 'assoc_value_nbr', 'numerical' ),
00169         );
00170     }

00248     public function valueFilter( $value = null )
00249     {
00250         //  Nothing? Move along...
00251         if ( null === $value )
00252             return $this;
00253         
00254         //  Not an array? Make one...
00255         if ( ! is_array( $value ) ) $value = array( $value );
00256 
00257         //  No items?
00258         if ( empty( $value ) )
00259             return $this;
00260         
00261         //  Make string...
00262         if ( count( $value ) == 1 )
00263             $_condition = '( assoc_value_nbr is null or assoc_value_nbr = ' . $value[0] . ')';
00264         else
00265             $_condition = '( assoc_value_nbr is null or assoc_value_nbr in (' . implode( ',', $value ) . '))';
00266 
00267         $this->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith( array( 'condition' => $_condition ) );
00268         return $this;
00269     }

00302     public static function getCodeFromAbbreviation( $codeType, $codeAbbreviation )
00303     {

00340     public static function lookup( $codeType, $codeAbbreviation = null, $returnIdOnly = true )
00341     {
00342         $_code = self::getCodes( null, $codeType, $codeAbbreviation );

00350     public function active( $activeOnly = true )
00351     {
00352         if ( $activeOnly && $this->hasAttribute( $this->_activeAttributeName ) ) $this->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith( array( 'condition' => 'active_ind = :active_ind', 'params' => array( ':active_ind' => 1 ) ) );
00353         return $this;
00354     }

00363     protected static function _findModelClass()
00364     {
00365         $_modelClass = 'Codes';
00366 
00367         //  Can't really use get_called_class with 5.2...
00368         if ( version_compare( PHP_VERSION, '5.3.0' ) >= 0 )
00369             $_modelClass = get_called_class();
00370 
00371         return $_modelClass;
00372     }
